body.p: All defined Profiling Condition Sets are available as shortcuts in the Profiling / Conditional Text menu. Just click on a menu entry to apply the condition set. The filtered content is grayed-out in Author editor, Outline view and DITA Maps Manager view. An element is filtered-out when one of its attributes is part of the condition set and its value does not match any of the value covered by the condition set.
